item.title: Changing the button for “Fork” into “Bork!” for Github
item.description: This has to be the best thing to come out of 2023 (and yes, it’s only January so that’s saying something) My longest blog post and read to date, but I promise you it’s worth it! I was on the First Time Contributor training yesterday, one of the Sharing is Caring sessions led by David Warner and Hugo Bernier. (<3) M365 & Power Platform | Sharing Is Caring (pnp.github.io) In this training they explain how Github works, and how to edit an existing item using the Branches, Forks, Committing changes and how a Pull Request works.
